Geometry, graphs and machine learning

May 14, 2024

The GraphML group gather to welcome a new member and to talk abut connections between geometry, graphs and machine learning!

Time and place: 14 May 2024 13:00, UiT FPARK room A289.

Abtract: We welcome Marta Panizzut (homepage) who is a new associate professor in the Math department at UiT! She is working with graphs and geometry (Algebraic geometry, tropical geometry).

A brainstorming session on graphs, geometry and machine learning is organized to celebrate this new member of the Northernmost GraphML group!

The Northermost GraphML group in the world, based in Troms√∏, Norway.
